name: GoodLife
0:
”Alexa, turn ON kitchen lights”
”Alexa, turn OFF kitchen lights”
”Alexa, turn ON fan in Guest Room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Good Life by Good Life Tech let you control your smart devices that are linked to your Good Life Cloud account.

It can control lights, fan, sockets or any device that is configured with Smart Switchboard panel.
